Html:
Hi there,

I'm currently building an application based on prism v2 (will migrate to v4 soon) and wanted to know if anyone has done some localization to modules so far? 

The approaches i have seen made changes to app.xaml, which we only have for the shell. 

Thanks for your help.

Joachim

Hi Joachim,

Nice to see that you start using Prism v4 soon. Regarding to localization in Prism v4 it seems to be out-of-scope based on the following Blaine’s blog post:

  • Prism 4.0 Plan & Drop Available on Codeplex

It means that there will not be guidance about this topic in the meantime, but it does not mean that it is not possible to implement on your own. So, you could take a look at the following documentation sections and links:

  • Localizing Silverlight-based Applications
  • Deployment and Localization
  • CurrentCulture
  • Silverlight Globalization
  • Silverlight V2 Beta2 Globalization readme

Please let me know if this helps.

Fernando Antivero
http://blogs.southworks.net/fantivero
